org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.blob.datastore

Interface BlobTracker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlobIdTracker

    public interface BlobTracker
extends java.io.Closeable
    Track the blob ids.
